title: assertion failure in rustc (f64 as f64)
body:
Get a rustc assertion failure when compiling this short bit of code.

I tried this code:

fn main() {
    let n = <f64 as f64>::consts::NAN;
}

I get a compiler panic:

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` (left: `Some(f64)`, right: `None`)', /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/librustc_typeck/astconv.rs:1515
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7fe2f56433fa - std::sys::imp::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::h3188f035833a2635
                        at /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:42
(etc.)

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
rustc 1.15.0 (10893a9a3 2017-01-19)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 10893a9a349cdd423f2490a6984acb5b3b7c8046

host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.15.0
LLVM version: 3.9
